File.Title: EVO:RAIL
File.Name: EVO-RAIL-Upgrade-onlinetest.bin
File.Abstract: VMware EVO:RAIL is the first hyper-converged infrastructure appliance powered 100% by VMware's compute, networking, storage, and management software. EVO:RAIL deployment, configuration and management streamlines initial setup and ongoing operations including updates with zero downtime and automatic scale-out. EVO:RAIL is fully deployed in minutes, once racked, cabled and powered on.

File.Title: vSphere Data Protection Advanced
File.Name: details?downloadGroup=VDP58_0&productId=452
File.Abstract: vSphere Data Protection Advanced is the native backup and recovery solution for vSphere. It provides disk-based backup of VMs, and Microsoft Exchange, SQL, and SharePoint applications. VDPA is based on industry-leading EMC Avamar backup technology, and also supports EMC Data Domain protection storage.

File.Title: CloudArray Virtual Edition
File.Name: showSignupForm.action?fromWebsite=2981&licenseType=32
File.Abstract: CloudArray’s approach to storage management enables you to scale your storage area networks (SAN) and network-attached storage (NAS) with on-demand cloud storage, providing a permanent solution for block and file capacity expansion, offsite storage, and data archiving.

File.Title: RecoverPoint for VMs
File.Abstract: EMC RecoverPoint for Virtual Machines, a hypervisor-based data protection solution, protects and recovers VMware VMs with VM level granularity. It streamlines your recovery workflows, eliminating complexity via automated disaster recovery orchestration.

File.Title: VSPEX BLUE Manager
File.Name: VSPEX-BLUE-Upgrade-onlinetest1.bin
File.Abstract: Provides the brains to your VSPEX BLUE appliance. Now you can manage your appliance just like you want to!

File.Title: VSPEX BLUE Manager

File.Abstract: Provides the brains to your VSPEX BLUE appliance. Now you can manage your appliance just like you want to!
